entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers except a few wet flurries over higher terrain late in the evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023
